import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import LoadingBox from "../components/LoadingBox"; import MessageBox from "../components/MessageBox"; export default function ProductScreen(props) { const productDetails = useSelector( state => state.productDetails ); const { loading, error, product } = productDetails; return (
{loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (
Back to result

  • {product.name}

  • Price : ${product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    ${product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? ( In Stock ) : ( Unavailable )}
)}
); }
